category: Safety and Health Management Regulations/Article 11 (Safety Management Workers)
contents: Article 11 (Safety Management Workers) ① Safety management workers refer to the head of the safety department and safety officers, and can be composed according to the following items. Revised 2021. 12. 22., 2022. 12. 16., 1. Head of safety department: Head of the department in charge of disaster, safety, and health work in accordance with Article 15 of the 「Organizational Regulations」 2. Safety officer: Each head office Department heads and branch heads, ② The head of the safety department performs the following duties: 1. Among the duties of the manager prescribed in Article 9, Paragraph 2, assist the manager with regard to technical matters related to safety and provide guidance to the management supervisor. ·Advice, 2. Establishment and implementation management of a safety management responsibility plan, 3. Tasks stipulated in each subparagraph of Article 18 (1) of the Enforcement Decree of the Industrial Safety Act, 4. Other matters related to safety management, ③ The safety manager is responsible for the following tasks. 1. Management of the safety management tasks of the relevant department (or branch), 2. Implementation and cooperation of the safety management responsibility plan, 3. Other matters related to safety management, ④ Notwithstanding paragraph 1, the management supervisor. Performs duties on behalf of the safety officer in his absence.
